text:
Hobnob | Honolulu, HI (Hawaii) | Fulltime | Onsite / Possibly Remote

Contact us here: https://hobnob.io

We do mobile-first event invitations via text message (but honestly, way cooler than that sounds). We're pioneering the "invisible-app" movement. (We're funded.)

Looking for a senior full-stack engineer that's interested in:

- Elixir and Phoenix (Or Erlang)

- Ruby and Rails

- Node.js and React

- React Native
